reset_password_p: Enter a new password for your account
register_p: Welcome to our store Hand in Hand to help GAZA
login_p: Welcome Back to Hand In Hand Store
reset_sent_message: A reset link wil be sent to your email.
verify_code_p: A code is sent to your email
error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
error_password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
how_it_works_desc: An easy-to-use platform connecting sellers and buyers to support the Palestinian cause
real_impact_desc: Real stories about how your donations help families in Gaza
full_transparency_desc: Track your donations and see in detail who benefits
percentage_desc: Choose a product or transaction and decide a percentage to directly support Gaza families
featured_products_desc: Shop from these products where sellers donate 100% of the profit
real_stats: Real statistics about the difference you make
beneficiaries.header.title: Words from Beneficiaries
beneficiaries.header.subtitle: Real stories about the impact of your donations

footer.title: Gaza Store for All
footer.description: An online platform that enables you to support the people of Gaza through buying and selling.
footer.bottom: Gaza Store for All - All rights reserved.

profilePage.title: Settings
profilePage.description: Manage your account settings and store preferences to support the people of Gaza

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.inAppDescription: Receive notifications within the store when updates occur
notifications.newOrdersDescription: Receive a notification when new orders are received
notifications.donationsDescription: Receive updates about the impact of your donations in Gaza
notifications.offersDescription: Receive special offers and updates from the store

store.title: Store Settings
store.storeDescriptionDefault: Gaza Store for All is a platform for selling products and directing all profits to support families in need in Gaza. We strive to offer the best products with the greatest benefit for our people in Gaza.
store.logoSizeHint: The logo should be a maximum of 300×300 pixels

donation.title: Donation Preferences
donation.description: Manage donation settings to support the people of Gaza
donation.donationPercentInfo: Your {percent}% donation means {percent, select, 100 {all} other {{percent}% of}} profits will go to support the people of Gaza
donation.reportToggleDescription: Receive a detailed monthly report about your donations and their impact

deleteSection.title: Delete Account
deleteSection.description: Permanently delete your account from the platform
deleteSection.warningTitle: Warning: This action is final and cannot be undone
warningPoints: All your personal data will be permanently removed
All active products in your store will be discontinued
All incomplete orders will be canceled
You will no longer be able to access your donation history
deleteSection.exportRecommendation: We recommend exporting your data before proceeding with account deletion.
deleteSection.confirmPrompt: Are you absolutely sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
deleteSection.successMessage: Your account has been successfully deleted. We are sorry to see you go and thank you for your support for the people of Gaza.
deleteSection.errorMessage: Failed to delete the account, please try again.
deleteSection.invalidConfirmMessage: Please type "Delete my account" correctly to confirm.

profileSection.title: Profile
profileSection.description: Manage your personal account information and profile picture
profileSection.imageSizeHint: The image must be less than 2MB

securitySection.title: Security
securitySection.description: Manage your account security and password settings
securitySection.passwordMismatchMessage: The new password and its confirmation do not match

sidebar.title: Gaza Store for All
sidebar.description: All donations support the people of Gaza

card.howItWorksDescription: Learn how your purchases make a difference for Gaza
card.realImpactDescription: Your purchases directly support families in Gaza through donations.
card.fullTransparencyDescription: Track where every dollar goes with our transparent donation process.
card.percentageDescription: Choose the percentage of profits to donate to Gaza.

hero.title: Support Gaza with Every Purchase
hero.description: Shop at Gaza Store and contribute to meaningful change through donations.

header.title: Stories from Gaza
header.subtitle: Hear from those who have been directly impacted by your donations

testimonials.text: Thanks to your donations, we were able to rebuild our family home that was damaged in the destruction. Words cannot express our gratitude.
testimonials.name: Ahmed Abu Raida

testimonials.text: The medical supplies we received helped save the lives of dozens of children and injured people. Donating through this store is not just a sale, it’s a lifeline.
testimonials.name: Dr. Sumaya Al-Najjar

testimonials.text: Thanks to the donations received through Gaza Store for All, we provided family meals to hundreds of families in the most vulnerable areas.
testimonials.name: Dr. Mohammed Abdul Rahman

header.title: Your Donations Make an Impact
header.subtitle: Real stats showing the difference you're making
